name: UNIX
description: A multitasking, multi-user computer operating system originally developed in 1969, variants of which now form the underpinning of many operating systems, including OS X, iOS, and Linux.

steps.name: Critical Learning

resources.title: Read The Linux Programming Interface. Chapters 1,  2, 6, 8, 10, 14, 15, 18, 25, 44, 62.

validations: You can use these commands and operators: |, <, >, >>, &, ack, awk, cat, chmod, chown, cp, export, find, kill, locate, ls, mkdir, mv, ps, rm, sed, sort, tail, top, vim, whereis, xargs
